channel.title: SoulSplit [FIXED]
channel.description:
Recently someone released SoulSplit it was decompiled etc. It took me roughly 30-45 minutes to fix it all up yet to fix all the fucked up variable names.
Thoughts on if i should release? -I think it'll ruin the RSPS community will all SS sources going around. -No server will be unique anymore -Tell me if you think Moparians deserve it.
Fixed the item problem. [img]http://i.imgur.com/UXMzE.png[/img]
Fixed the combat problem. [img]http://i.imgur.com/dW3eR.png[/img]
Fixed the shops problem. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Zsu5L.png[/img]
Fixed all special attacks. [img]http://i.imgur.com/JG1D7.png[/img]

item.title: SoulSplit [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @jacob4rd jacob4rd
item.description:
@jacob4rd wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:9, topic:446654”][quote author=jacob4rd link=topic=549547.msg4028340#msg4028340 date=1340519303]

-I think it’ll ruin the RSPS community will all SS sources going around.

…Just because a single server is released doesn’t mean everyone will download it (especially when it’s not even that great) [quote author=jacob4rd link=topic=549547.msg4028298#msg4028298 date=1340515817]
-No server will be unique anymore
[/quote]Are you retarded? Even if the Runescape server source were to be released it wouldn’t be used by 100% of servers. SS is some bullshit 317 loading 700 server, so I imagine we can think of a way to keep our servers unique.[quote author=jacob4rd link=topic=549547.msg4028298#msg4028298 date=1340515817]
-Tell me if you think Moparians deserve it.

If you really wish to prejudice an entire community, you can just get the fuck off of these forums.
[/quote]

  1. Yes is does. It happened before what was the base called… Oh yeah Project Insanity.

  2. I’m not an idiot you obviously are… If “Runescape server source” was released it would be by EVERYONE you can count on that. In-fact RSPS would die because of it.

  3. I’m not being prejudice of an entire community i’m simply saying “Moparians” because i have the right?

  4. Lose the fucking attitude.
    [/quote]
    No, you just prejudiced an entire community.
    Let me know if you think Blacks deserved rights in the 1860s. See what I did there?

Also, the RSC community still exists. That’s proof enough that old revisions would still function, even if the RS2 source were released.

its shit, so do whatever you want with it.

Also, ^[/quote]

I saw, but it’s a pretty idiotic statement.

You really are dumb. You don’t classify a server by the client it uses, but by the content the source has seeing as like you SAID “runescape source” EVERY SERVER WOULD BE THE SAME. It doesn’t take a rocket scientist to make it connect to a lower revision client.

Also cool story.

@Cat I’m releasing it after i fix this last bug

EDIT: I’m done so don’t bother replying.

EDIT2: Fixed the special attacks.

JG1D7.png818×574

Read full topic
